title: Lewandowski's Homecoming
description:
The FC crew react to today's UEFA Champions League draw which saw Bayern Munich, Barcelona, Inter and Viktoria Plzen all in the "Group of Death". The guys break down Lewandowski's return to the German champions, if PSG and Man City can finally win the Champions League and if Liverpool should focus on one competition over the other.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: UCL draw pits Bayern, Barcelona and Inter all in the same group; PSG set to face off against Juventus; Liverpool v Rangers tops Group A
